details:
noun
- a show or display
= synonyms: presentation
- a show of military force or preparedness
= example: a show of military force or preparedness
- a public display of group feelings (usually of a political nature)
= example: a public display of group feelings (usually of a political nature)
= synonyms: manifestation
- proof by a process of argument or a series of proposition proving an asserted conclusion
= synonyms: monstrance
- a visual presentation showing how something works
= example: a visual presentation showing how something works
= synonyms: demo
